dev-master.name: epam/ci-bundle
dev-master.description: This bundle provides functionality for Continuous Integration & Automated Deployments for Symfony-based projects

suggest.doctrine\/doctrine-migrations-bundle: Required for Doctrine Migrations during build & deployment
suggest.doctrine\/migrations: Required for Doctrine Migrations during build & deployment
suggest.doctrine\/doctrine-fixtures-bundle: Required for Doctrine Fixtures during build
suggest.doctrine\/data-fixtures: Required for Doctrine Fixtures during build
suggest.ext-xsl: Required by apidoc phing target (backed by phpDocumentor 2)
